title: 72/282. Complete and unconditional withdrawal of foreign military forces from the territory of the Republic of Moldova

paragraphs.1: Expresses deep concern about the continued stationing of the Operational Group of Russian Forces and its armaments on the territory of the Republic of Moldova without the consent of that State Member of the United Nations;
paragraphs.2: Urges the Russian Federation to complete, unconditionally and without further delay, the orderly withdrawal of the Operational Group of Russian Forces and its armaments from the territory of the Republic of Moldova;
paragraphs.3: Expresses support for and further encourages the facilitation by the States participating in the Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe of the completion of the process of withdrawal of the Russian forces and armaments from the territory of the Republic of Moldova, in accordance with the relevant decisions of the Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe and as agreed at its summit held in Istanbul in 1999;
paragraphs.4: Decides to include in the provisional agenda of its seventy-third session an item entitled “Complete withdrawal of foreign military forces from the territory of the Republic of Moldova”.
